summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FinZen Croatian invoice management application. Backend APIs are 100% functional, frontend core features working well with minor CSV upload issue.

ui_bugs.issue: File input element not found in dashboard upload zone
ui_bugs.details: Upload zone exists but file input selector may be hidden or have different structure

passed_tests: Backend API health check (19/19 endpoints working)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Transactions, Vendors, Settings)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix CSV upload file input selector issue in dashboard upload zone. The upload zone is visible but file input element is not accessible via standard selector.
